Bacloud.com - OWN data center operator in Lithuania, Europe

**Configure servers follow your needs! SAVE 17% on annual payments!**

We accept: BitCoin/Altcoins, Paypal,  Credit Cards, AliPay, Webmoney,  Tenpay ( WeChat ), UnionPay, CashU, SafetyPay, Perfect Money, Direct bank transfer.[/QUOTE] All payment methods are listed here: https://www.bacloud.com/en/payment-methods
